childMdx.excerpt: We've been building this temple, quietly, the old man and me, placing with care each stone hauled  [[here]]  from right across our dispersed…
There is no obligation but clear deliverance, darkly lit, of how we danced in a scented daze, this knight and queen in checkered  [[space…
"The colour of Allah is upon us! And what better dye than that of Allah. It is Him we worship." 2:138 "The colour of my  [[love]]  is deep…
"The decree is for the truth to  [[be]]  experienced by all humankind, if  [[not]]  in this  [[life]] , then after  [[death]] ." - Shaykh…
Well, dear friends, the captain's now a gardener who watches carefully the weeds of his words and all the little whispers, while the others…
